page.title: 15Trade and Tourism.
page.content:
{ {Commercial premises}of the block include a general food shop,a fish and chip shop,a seller of free range eggs and honey,an antiques establishment,a craft shop,a garage,a game farm,a wood carving centre, and a pub.
There are no hotels and{accommodation {for visitors}is with board in a few private houses, or self catering in some houses and a very few static caravans.
{Visitors}to one of the self catering holiday houses came from such diverse areas as West Yorkshire,South England, Scotland,Switzerland,and West Germany. Some were members of sporting clubs such as Mountaineering, Orienteering, and Cycling.
